The claim is made by Republican U: S. Sen. Ron Johnson in an ad campaign against his opponent, Democrat Russ Feingold.
Johnson: s biography is the only one that includes the word "manufacturer," as he helped start and build a plastics manufacturing company called Pacur.
While Johnson: s primary occupation before becoming a senator was in manufacturing, there are a few other senators with manufacturing connections, such as U.S. Sen. Charles Grassley and U.S. Sen. Chris Coons, though they do not identify themselves solely as manufacturers.
